phase_title: Client UI And SDK Platform Refresh
goal: Replace outdated phase 6 tasks with a production-aligned plan for admin-ui v2, backend language SDKs, frontend/API SDKs, and project-centric tenant experience.
constraints: Planning artifacts only in this phase output. No feature implementation in this task pack.
Do not remove UI mocks unless matching backend API contracts exist or are explicitly delivered in dependent phases.
Privileged tenant/client context must be derived from authenticated token or validated API key context; do not trust mutable client_id/tenant_id from browser request bodies.
Project-aware rollout must include backward-compatible migration/backfill from existing application records before hard enforcement.
delivery_quality_gates: Every dashboard module declares capability state: real, degraded, or blocked-by-backend.
No production mutation route accepts tenant/client identity solely from UI-supplied body fields.
Browser auth/session handling follows environment-aware cookie security policy and CSRF model.
